Title: Object: Papyrus Chester Beatty 6
Description: Papyrus Chester Beatty VI; sheet 2; Hieratic text both sides: medical treatise. Recto 7-8, Verso 1-2.
Curator's comments: Published: Gardiner, Hieratic Papyri Vol. 1, p. 53-4. Vol. 2. Plates 31 & 31A, Recto 7; Plates 32 & 32 A, Recto 8, Verso 1-2. (Recto = Medical Prescriptions, Verso = Fragments of Magical Text)
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381083) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381083)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, fragile Black ink Red ink Tabbed: kraft paper Displayed in Room 62 until 1997 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alfred Chester Beatty
Donated by: Lady Edith Chester Beatty
